textBeforeTable: Product Measurements: Imported Front zipper with button closure. Front and back pockets. Machine wash. Fabric provides stretch. 84% Cotton, 14% Polyester, 2% Elastane. Final Sale: This item cannot be returned or exchanged. You never dread Mondays - or any day, for that matter - because you've found a career you love, a personal style, and this dark wash blue jean from Levi’s in a form-flattering cut! Slipping into this stretchy, indigo blue, denim legging makes you crave a polka-dot top and a fitted blazer, a printed sweater and ballet flats, or a surplice tunic and leopard pumps - you get the idea. Whether you’re rockin’ this pair for a casual day at the office or window shopping with a pal, let these jeans become the chic canvas upon which you paint your super-fun looks, day after day!
